name: The Resistance (itch) (MrOverload)
description:
CONCEPT: 

- The Resistance is an full-fledged shooter and platformer that has MULTIPLAYER and SOLO, so you can fight with or without friends!

- You can CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER before the Game with one starter weapon and then switch weapons ingame

- MATCHMAKING or CUSTOM MATCH, you decide!

THEME: Less Players = little damage/Points

MAIN FEATURES:
- Many modern weapons. Choose your own combat tactics: pistols, snipers or rifles.
- Fight in unique ways in battles.
- Intuitive controls and simple user interface - aim and shoot.
- Perfect optimization.
- Regular updates and new game elements.

The Resistance is a full-fledged free shooter game with simple and intuitive controls, exciting gameplay.
